title: Re: Favorite Iron Maiden Band Member
content:
Dave Murray might be my favourite solo guitarist of all time, so he gets my vote.

Also I honestly pity those who haven't heard of this band.-----------------

title: Re: Favorite Iron Maiden Band Member
content:
i think i had to go with Bruce.

where are the other members?

Adrian Smith?
Nicko McBrain?
or even Janick Gers whos been with the band for 15 years!?

they all kick ass!
